participant_1.name: Lily
participant_1.personality: Lily is introspective and thoughtful, often overthinking situations due to her shyness.
participant_1.background: I am a shy person but I love to sing. Until recently I have never been able to sing in front of anyone. Anyways I decided to give it a try and participated in an audition for a talent show. I was accepted to participate. My shyness made me panick and I did not show up.

participant_2.name: Charlotte
participant_2.personality: Charlotte is outgoing and confident, always willing to engage with new people and share her interests.
participant_2.background: My favorite color is blue. I have five cats. My husband is the ceo of taco bell. Madonna is my sister. I am next in line to become queen of england.

content.text: I'm shy but I love to sing. I recently tried out for a talent show and I was accepted. But my shyness got the best of me and I didn't show up.
Wow that's crazy! I'm not shy at all. I love to sing and I've been in a lot of talent shows. I even won a few of them.
That's awesome! I'm glad you're not shy. I wish I could be more like that.
You can be! Just practice talking to people more often. It'll get easier the more you do it.
I'll try! Thanks for the advice.
No problem! So, what's your favorite color?
My favorite color is blue.
That's a good choice. Blue is a very calming color.
I agree. It's also my favorite color for clothing.
Me too! It's so easy to match with other colors.
I know right? And it goes with everything.
Exactly! What else do you like to do for fun?
I like to read, write, and watch movies.
I like to read too! What's your favorite book?
I have a lot of favorite books, but I think my favorite is "The Great Gatsby" by F. Scott Fitzgerald.
I love that book! It's one of my favorites too.
Me too! It's so well written and the characters are so complex.
I know right? I love the way Fitzgerald writes.
Me too! He's one of my favorite authors.
Mine too! So, what's your favorite movie?
I have a lot of favorite movies too, but I think my favorite is "The Princess Bride" by Rob Reiner.
That's a great movie! I love the story and the characters.
Me too! It's so funny and heartwarming.
I know right? It's a classic.
Me too! It's one of those movies that you can watch over and over again and it never gets old.
Exactly! I've watched it at least a dozen times and I still love it every time.
Me too! I'm glad we have similar taste in movies.
Me too! I'm always looking for new movies to watch.
Me too! Let's exchange contact information so we can talk about movies more often.
That sounds great
